jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek is the fastest growing decacorn in South East Asia. Having started off as a simple ride hailing company it slowly evolved as a platform for daily needs and luxuries with services such as gofood etc. GOJEK also has it's own payment wallet called gopay which is fast becoming the payment option of choice in Indonesia in both online and offline commerce. 

To support our massive growth, we have branches that work side-by-side to us. We are looking for an IT Support to be placed in Gurugram branch. Reach us out if you are eager to be a part of our massive growth.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Provide experience and satisfaction to IT service users in Branches and satellites.
  • Responsible for handling and resolving issues related to office IT (e.g: laptops, printers, etc.).
  • Maintain & store office assets (e.g: laptops, printers, mobile network devices etc.) both in branches and satellites.
  • Ensure the network connection is running normally and escalate with the network team if there are obstacles.
  • Collaborating with 3rd parties (all vendors related to IT infrastructure branch needs).
  • Supporting the IT Infrastructure project.
  • Provides user guidance / training on how to use tools related to work productivity such as Laptops, Printers, etc.
  • Become support for IT Infrastructure Branch services that handle all end user device problems.

• At least 2 years of experience working as an IT Support and/or handling assets are prioritised.
  • Good interpersonal & communication skills.
  • Able to work independently and in teams.
  • Good eyes for details and innovation-oriented.
  • Having knowledge in the IT field is a must (Windows & MacOs).
  • Willing to be placed in Gurugram.
  • Having experience in the IT industry is a big plus.
